name: Draw n Run
description:
Draw n Run is a fun and addictive puzzle game to train your brain.

Simply draw a road, a wall or a staircase to make the little man run into the door. Challenge your brain with DrawnRun anywhere, anytime!


FEATURES
- FREE to play.
- Variety of skins to unlock.
- Unique and fun puzzle levels.
- Easy to play but hard to master.
- Different ways to pass each level.
- Less ink, more stars.

Enjoy!
publishers: WUHAN HUIJUFEIFAN NETCOM SCIENCE & TECHNOLOGY CO
